landing_page.trusted_partner: Your trusted partner in the creation of innovative IT solutions.
landing_page.title: Development of IT Systems – Your Partner in Technology
landing_page.welcome: Welcome to Development of IT Systems, a company dedicated to helping businesses in Croatia and Europe create innovative solutions, automate processes, and achieve new levels of efficiency. We are here for those who aim to optimize their business with modern technologies.

services.title: Our Services
services.web: Web Application Development: Reliable and powerful solutions using Angular and .NET.
services.mobile: Mobile Applications: Intuitive applications for any platform.
services.automation: Business Process Automation: From analysis to full implementation of automated systems.
services.cloud: Cloud Technologies: System integration into the cloud and support for digital transformation.
services.consulting: Consulting: Tailored recommendations and strategies for IT optimization.
services.reporting: Advanced Reporting: Development of analytical tools and support for OLAP cubes.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us?
why_choose_us.experience: Experience: Over 25 years in IT with diverse business projects.
why_choose_us.customer_focus: Customer-Oriented Approach: We listen to clients and deliver solutions tailored to their needs.
why_choose_us.innovation: Innovation: Always up to date with the latest trends and technologies.
why_choose_us.quality: Quality: Attention to detail and results that exceed expectations.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.automation: Automation of sales agents, warehouses, and cash systems.
expertise.management_tools: Development of management and business analysis tools.
expertise.business_solutions: Implementation of comprehensive business automation solutions.
expertise.digital_transition: Transition to digital platforms and cloud system integration.

start_today.title: Start Your Journey with Us Today!
start_today.message: We are ready to turn your ideas into reality or help you find the best solution for your business.
start_today.link: Contact us through our contact page, and we will prepare a personalized offer for you.

footer.made: © 2024 Development of IT Systems. All Rights Reserved.

about.title: About us
about.description: We provide cutting-edge solutions in .NET, Angular, SQL, and Azure.
about.intro: Your trusted partner in creating innovative it solutions. with years of experience in the software development industry, we specialize in delivering high-quality, reliable, and scalable systems tailored to meet your business needs.
about.web_dev_desc: Building dynamic and responsive web applications using angular and modern frameworks.
about.cloud_solutions_desc: Implementing scalable solutions on Azure to enhance your business operations.
about.enterprise_systems_desc: Developing robust systems with .Net, C#, and SQL for seamless business processes.
about.consulting_desc: Providing expert advice to optimize your it infrastructure.
about.mission: At "Development of IT Systems", we aim to empower businesses with cutting-edge technology. we believe in building long-term partnerships based on trust, innovation, and excellence.
about.why_choose_us_point_2: - Commitment to quality and timely delivery.
about.why_choose_us_point_3: - Personalized approach tailored to your needs.

web_development.title: Web development
web_development.description: We specialize in creating responsive and user-friendly websites tailored to meet your business needs. using the latest technologies such as angular, .net, and modern frontend frameworks, we deliver high-performing web applications that enhance user experience and drive results.
key_services: Backend integration with .net and restful apis.

cloud_solutions.title: Cloud solutions
cloud_solutions.description: Our team provides scalable and secure cloud solutions to help businesses leverage the power of cloud computing. we specialize in microsoft Azure to deliver cloud-based services that optimize your operations and reduce infrastructure costs.
key_services: Migrating on-premises systems to the cloud.

it_consulting.title: IT consulting
it_consulting.description: With over 20 years of experience in it, we provide expert consulting services to help businesses align their technology strategies with their goals. our expertise spans software development, system architecture, and it infrastructure.

custom_software_development.title: Custom software development
custom_software_development.description: We develop custom software solutions tailored to your unique business processes. whether you need a desktop application, an enterprise solution, or a specific tool, we ensure the software fits your requirements perfectly.
key_services: Maintenance and updates for existing software.

mobile_app_development.title: Mobile App Development
mobile_app_development.description: We create mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences across iOS and Android devices. Our team specializes in developing native and cross-platform apps that are fast, secure, and user-friendly.

frontend_development.title: Frontend Development
frontend_development.description: Our frontend development services focus on creating modern, interactive, and visually appealing user interfaces. We bring designs to life using Angular and other cutting-edge frontend technologies.

backend_development.title: Backend Development
backend_development.description: Our backend solutions are designed to ensure stability, scalability, and security for your applications.

database_management.title: Database Management
database_management.description: We provide database management services to help businesses store for SQL and No-SQL, manage, and secure their data effectively. Our expertise covers database design, optimization, and maintenance for various database systems.

devops_and_automation.title: DevOps and Automation
devops_and_automation.description: Our DevOps and automation services help businesses streamline their development processes, improve collaboration, and increase efficiency. We implement automation tools and practices to accelerate software delivery and ensure quality.

technical_support.title: Technical Support
technical_support.description: We provide reliable technical support to ensure your IT systems operate smoothly. Our proactive approach minimizes downtime and maximizes productivity.
